<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[To Battle!](/Feats.aspx?ID=2013) <actions string="Single Action or Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Auditory" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=16" />
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=73" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 181 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Marshal](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=66)

**Prerequisites**
[Marshal Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2005)

</column>

---

With a resounding cry, you rally your ally to the offensive. Choose one ally within your marshal's aura who has a reaction available. If you spend 1 action, that ally can use their reaction to immediately Stride. If you spend 2 actions, that ally can use their reaction to immediately Strike.
name: To Battle!
